data.title: Introduction
data.meta_description: E.A. Burtt brought a pair of insoluble ideas into collision--metaphysics and science--beginning with the curious word juxtaposition in the title of The Metaphysical Foundations of Modern Physical Science. The work has a majestic strangeness, owing to the penetrating...
